description: The survivor of a Donegal fishing tragedy speaks publicly for the first time, 62 years on.
title: Donegal fishing tragedy: How the sinking of the Jack Buchan 'left its mark'
title_page: Donegal fishing tragedy: How the sinking of the Jack Buchan 'left its mark' - BBC News
maintext: "I will never forget that knock on the door. The whole house went silent - it was the local sergeant to tell us our daddy was gone. It was awful," explained Annie.
